title: Mass shootings in the U.S. : legality of shooter 's weapons , as of February 2020
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.
Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has the highest Number of incidents and Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally has the lowest Number of incidents.
The highest Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has 81.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.

The maximum Number of incidents 82.0 is found at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained and the minimum is found at Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally where Category Of The Weapon is 1.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Category Of The Weapon, and Number of incidents in each Category Of The Weapon on the y axis.
Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has the highest Number of incidents and Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally has the lowest Number of incidents.
The highest Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has 81.0 more Number of incidents than the lowest Category Of The Weapon Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 4 number of Category Of The Weapons.
Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained has the highest Number of incidents and Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally has the lowest Number of incidents.
Category Of The Weapon Unknown/to be determined has the second highest value for Number of incidents.
The difference of Number of incidents between the highest and lowest Category Of The Weapon is 81.0.
Number of incidents at Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained is 82.0 , second place is Unknown/to be determined at 18.0, and thirdly is Illegally obtained at 16.0.
The Category Of The Weapon Legally obtained tends to be 2.8 percent higher than average.
The Number of incidents is 117.0 if we add up values of all Category Of The Weapons.

data.Category Of The Weapon: Some weapons were legally obtained others possibly illegally
